org.mini2Dx.core.game

Class GameContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicGame, ScreenBasedGame

    public abstract class GameContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for mini2Dx game containers. All games using mini2Dx must extend this.
